description: This app is an (unofficial) guide to German queer film festival VERZAUBERT taking place the upcoming two weekends in several major German cities. The app allows you to get a quick overview on what films will be shown, show-times for each film, where you can buy tickets, where the theaters are situated, etc. Also, for each film a synopsis is presented together with a few stills from the movie and links to websites and trailers. (Note: While the apps user interface is multi-lingual, most of the movie descriptions are not. It is a film festival taking place in Germany after all.)
versionNote: Updated movie database, descriptions and images and all data for the April / May 2011 film festival.
